infranken.de.309597.1: Discuss the abolition of the 50 + 1 rule
infranken.de.309597.2: The former DFB president Reinhard Grindel has recommended thinking about the abolition of the 50 + 1 rule.
infranken.de.309597.3: "At least, German football should discuss terms and conditions and clear rules for investors before the EU Commission has completed facts," said Grindel of the "picture on Sunday."
infranken.de.309597.4: He stressed: "For the clubs that are most likely to be dangerous to Bayern and Dortmund, the 50 + 1 rules do not work anyway: see Leipzig or Leverkusen.
infranken.de.309597.5: In this respect, the debate is not all about whether it is not commanded to facilitate clubs who want to break into this phalanx, to facilitate the inclusion of investors. "
infranken.de.309597.6: However, he has doubts whether there is a willingness in the German Football League to allow majority shareholdings, which are prohibited in the Bundesliga by the 50 + 1 rule.
infranken.de.309597.7: "It remains a legal risk to attract investment fences in a European internal market to the Bundesliga's economic location," said Grindel.
infranken.de.309597.8: The former DFB boss sees the danger that "the attempts to ensure a more competitive balance in the Bundesliga will ultimately only weaken the competitiveness of our top clubs at European level, but will not lead to more tension in the championship."
infranken.de.309597.9: Even a balance of TV funds will not achieve a decisive effect.
infranken.de.309597.10: "FC Bayern have a turnover of 750 million euros, Borussia Dortmund of 500 million and RB Leipzig of 300 million.
infranken.de.309597.11: Thus, the differences are already immense among the first three clubs.
infranken.de.309597.12: The other 15 clubs have an average budget of 130 million, "said the 58-year-old.
infranken.de.309597.13: With a view of the past, Grindel feels betrayed.
infranken.de.309597.14: "Unfortunately, there have been people who have noticed this mistake and pushed it through to the press instead of addressing me," said Grindel about the adoption of an expensive watch that led to his resignation in April 2019.
infranken.de.309597.15: "This has been very busy for me."
infranken.de.309597.16: He had received the gift worth around 11,000 euros from a Ukrainian official.
infranken.de.309597.17: "I have committed a compliance violation, and it was right to draw the consequences from this," said Grindel.
infranken.de.309597.18: "I handled the ominous watch gift completely transparently and innocently.
infranken.de.309597.19: Many of them knew in the DFB. "
infranken.de.309597.20: He never "made a secret of the gift," the 58-year-old assured.
infranken.de.309597.21: "This may be called naively, at least this form of transparency was the complete opposite of corruption."

morgenpost.de.276358.2: The Spanish second division football team CF Fuenlabrada is slipping deeper and deeper into the crisis due to a corona outbreak.

morgenpost.de.276358.17: Before the departure, there were four infected by the 19th July, but all of them were isolated and not left.
morgenpost.de.276358.18: Directly before the flight on Monday to A Coruña, all players and team members were tested again.

mz-web.de.376296.1: "Gone with the Wind": Film legend Olivia de Havilland is dead
mz-web.de.376296.2: The film legend and Oscar winner Olivia de Havilland is dead.
mz-web.de.376296.3: She died of natural causes on Sunday in Paris at the age of 104, confirmed her spokeswoman for the German Press Agency.
mz-web.de.376296.4: De Havilland was known for her role as Melanie Hamilton in the South State Epos "Blown From Winds" (1939).
mz-web.de.376296.5: Born in Tokyo to British parents, Olivia de Havilland moved to California as a toddler.
mz-web.de.376296.6: The Austrian theater Max Reinhardt discovered the 19-year-old in the role of the Hermia of Shakespeare's "Summer Night Straum."
mz-web.de.376296.7: The film studio Warner Brothers signed her for seven years and brought her out big at the side of Eroll Flynn.
mz-web.de.376296.8: She shot eight films with the heart breaker.
mz-web.de.376296.9: In 1946 she won her first Oscar in the leading role of "To Each His Own."
mz-web.de.376296.10: The film ran in Germany under the title "Mother Heart."
mz-web.de.376296.11: Three years later came the award for Best Actress in William Wyler's "The Heiress."
mz-web.de.376296.12: A lot of recognition was also included as a neurotic eccentric in "The Dark Mirror" and "The Slim Pit."
mz-web.de.376296.13: Daphne du Maurier proposed her in 1952 for the leading role in the film version of her novel "My Cousin Rachel."
mz-web.de.376296.14: The piece became a world-wide success.
mz-web.de.376296.15: With her long-time friend Bette Davis she played in "Lullaby for a Corpse."
mz-web.de.376296.16: From the marriage with the writer Marcus Goodrich (1946 to 1953), the son of Benjamin emerged.
mz-web.de.376296.17: In Paris, de Havilland married the journalist Pierre Paul Galante and had a daughter Gisèle with him.
mz-web.de.376296.19: However, rumors of an affair with former British Prime Minister Edward Heath were never confirmed.

paz-online.de.95211.6: Kalbitz is chairman of the AfD Group in the Brandenburg Land Day.
paz-online.de.95211.7: "If the AfD really wanted to consistently remove right-wing extremists from its party, functionaries like Björn Höcke and his supporters would have been excluded long ago," said Strasser.
paz-online.de.95211.8: "However, there is no political will in the AfD, because the right-wing extremism now belongs to the party."

paz-online.de.95211.11: Blume assumes that the AfD will again end up below five percent in elections in the future.
paz-online.de.95211.12: "The days of the AfD in the parliaments are counted."
paz-online.de.95211.13: Kalbitz was one of the spokesmen of the officially now dissolved "wing" around the Thuringian AfD state and parliamentary group chairman Björn Höcke; the Verfassungsschutz classifies the current as a "secured right-wing extremist aspiration."
paz-online.de.95211.14: In May, the AfD Federal Executive Board Kalbitz had thrown out of the party.
paz-online.de.95211.15: As a reason, he stated that Kalbitz had not indicated a previous membership in the now banned right-wing extremist "Heimattreuen Deutschen Jugend" (HDJ) and the Republicans when he joined the party.
paz-online.de.95211.17: The chairman of the Left Party in the Brandenburg Landtag, Sebastian Walter, also stressed that the decision of the Federal Arbitration Court did not change the character of the AfD: "The wolf only ate chalk.
paz-online.de.95211.18: The AfD remains a right-wing party, whether with or without Kalbitz. "

paz-online.de.95211.20: "The maneuver of the Meuthen truppe is manageable.
paz-online.de.95211.21: They want to avoid further observation by the Office for the Protection of the Constitution and try to get through under the radar, "said Walter.
paz-online.de.95211.22: "The AfD will not get rid of the spirits they called.
paz-online.de.95211.23: An expulsion does not change anything, "commented the Brandenburg SPD general secretary Erik Stohn on the decision in the Kalbitz case.
paz-online.de.95211.24: "The AfD State Association and the Group still held its right leader."

paz-online.de.95234.1: North Sea wind farms supply a good 21 percent more electricity
paz-online.de.95234.2: In the first six months of the year, the wind power stations on the German North Sea have fed electricity into the network 11,51 hours.
paz-online.de.95234.3: This is a good 21 percent more than in the same period of the previous year, announced the network operator Tennet in Bayreuth.
paz-online.de.95234.4: Tennet is responsible for the transfer of the North Sea electricity to the mainland and the line through the German electricity grid.
paz-online.de.95234.5: The wind turbines on the Baltic Sea, which are not part of Tennet's grid area, have fed in a further 2.22 terawatt hours (TWh) of electricity.
paz-online.de.95234.6: Overall, the wind electricity from North and Baltic Sea comes to 13.73 TWh, compared to good 11,64 TWh in the first half of 2019.
paz-online.de.95234.7: The wind harvest at sea thus accounts for almost 19 percent of the total wind power in Germany; this is about four percentage points more than a year ago.
paz-online.de.95234.8: New wind farms provide higher production capacities
paz-online.de.95234.9: In addition to wind conditions, the increased contribution of offshore wind energy results from higher generation capacities, as new wind farms have been connected to the grid in the past twelve months.
paz-online.de.95234.10: If the 1270 wind power stations in the North Sea all run at the same time with full power, they could generate electricity 6,7 gigawatt.
paz-online.de.95234.11: The transmission capacity is sufficient for this; according to Tennet, it is 7.1 gigawatts.
paz-online.de.95234.12: By 2030, it should rise at 17 gigawatts in the German North Sea.
paz-online.de.95234.13: "In Germany and the Netherlands, we are investing 20 billion euros in the expansion of offshore grid connections," said Tim Meyerjürgens, Managing Director of Tennet.
paz-online.de.95234.14: In reality, wind farms can not exploit their capacity at sea, but reach about 40%.
paz-online.de.95234.15: The record day so far this year is 2 January, when the North Sea wind farms generated more than six gigawatts of electricity.
paz-online.de.95234.16: On average, the North Sea wind turbines produce about 2.5 to 3.0 Gigawatt electricity, which corresponds to three to four nuclear power plants.
paz-online.de.95234.17: This could supply almost seven million households with electricity.

lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.2: Worms University of Applied Sciences continues to take to the skies: "DFS Deutsche Flugsicherung" donates a professorship for "Air Traffic Management."
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.3: A corresponding contract between the university and the DFS has now been signed in Worms.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.4: The contract was initially concluded for three years and will start in 2021.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.5: With the professorship, the opportunity to enable the start of study not only in the summer, but also for the winter semester.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.6: This means that twice as many students can be trained as before.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.7: At the same time, the capacities are evenly outsourced both in the university and at the DFS Air Security Academy.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.8: DFS will advise the university in setting up and filling the professorship.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.10: Since the summer semester of 2019, the first students have been in the Air Traffic Management course at Worms University of Applied Sciences as part of their training as an air traffic controller.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.11: This year, nine students already started.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.12: So far, DFS's experience has been very positive, and the students' performance has been excellent.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.13: The combination of study and lotus training contributes significantly to further increasing the attractiveness of the lotus profession.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.14: "In these times, promotion is not easy for us economically.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.15: However, we expect that air traffic is recovering and growing in the long term.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.16: In order to be able to continue fulfilling our legal mandate in the future, we need highly qualified personnel, "says Professor Klaus-Dieter Scheurle, Chairman Managing Director of DFS, at the signing of the contract.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.17: "For the DFS, the endowment of foundations is a future-proof investment that will convey a broad, interdisciplinary knowledge base in the long term.

rhein-zeitung.de.234631.2: North Korea has so far seen its own measures to defend against the coronavirus as a "shining success."
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.3: Now the country reports for the first time about a disaster.

rhein-zeitung.de.234631.5: Despite the strictest epidemiological defence measures in the past six months, "the malicious virus could have been introduced into the country," the state media reported.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.6: A state of emergency has been declared for the region around the border town of Kaesong.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.7: The communist leadership summoned the highest level of alarm.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.8: If the suspected case is confirmed, it would be the first official case of infection with Sars-CoV-2 in the isolated country.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.9: North Korea had previously not registered a single infection and described its defensive measures as "luminous success."
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.11: The symptoms of illness were identified in a "outsider" which illegally crossed the military demarcation line between South and North Korea on 19 July.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.12: The person fled to South Korea three years ago and has now returned across the border.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.13: For cross-border crossing within the four kilometre, and largely reduced military buffer zone was initially not confirmed in South Korea.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.14: However, according to reports by the national news agency Yonhap, South Korea's military acknowledged the possibility of an illegal border crossing into North Korea as high.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.15: These studies have been conducted on some people.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.16: North Korea, according to its own information, called an emergency meeting of the Politburo of the Workers' Party chaired by ruler Kim Jong Un on Saturday because of the suspected case.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.17: The "dangerous situation in Kaesong could trigger a deadly and destructive disaster."
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.18: Kim had already ordered on Friday, as a preventive measure, "to completely block Kaesong and to isolate each district and the region from others," it added.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.19: The data subject as well as all people in Kaesong, who had contact with her, had been put under quarantine.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.20: The central military commission of the party is to investigate the "runaway case" as well as the behavior of the responsible military unit and, if necessary, impose harsh punishment.

salzburg.com.306641.1: Formula 1 needs a special rule to shorten their world champion
salzburg.com.306641.2: Since it is not possible to race on the required number of continents, the FIA has to improvise to award the world titles.
salzburg.com.306641.3: All America races were cancelled in the event.
salzburg.com.306641.4: Race calendar is becoming more and more concrete
salzburg.com.306641.5: The racing calendar of the current Formula 1 season continues to form.
salzburg.com.306641.6: In addition to the ten Grand Prix confirmed so far, three more racetracks were added during the week.
salzburg.com.306641.7: In October, the Nürburgring will be driven in Germany and in the Portuguese Portimão.
salzburg.com.306641.8: On the first of November, Lewis Hamilton and Co. will fight for world championship points at the traditional Italian race track in Imola.
salzburg.com.306641.9: With this, the 2020 race calendar covers 13 races.
salzburg.com.306641.10: "We are pleased to continue to make great progress in completing our plans for the 2020 season," said Formula One boss Chase Carey.
salzburg.com.306641.11: In this exceptional season, 15 to 18 races should be completed in the Motor Sports Class.
salzburg.com.306641.12: Formula 1 wants to conclude its season in Asia.
salzburg.com.306641.13: The final race calendar should be fixed and published in the coming weeks.
salzburg.com.306641.14: According to media reports, before the already officially planned races in Bahrain and Abu Dhabi in December, appearances in Vietnam and Malaysia could take place at the end of November.
salzburg.com.306641.15: Regulations demands race on three continents
salzburg.com.306641.16: However, the regulations of Formula 1 require at least races on three continents for the awarding of the World Championship.
salzburg.com.306641.17: Even if, as planned, only on two continents, there should be a world champion.
salzburg.com.306641.18: With the help of a special rule, the FIA wants to award the titles, citing "exceptional circumstances" due to the coronavirus academy.
salzburg.com.306641.19: The traditional seasonal start in Australia in March had to be cancelled due to the railway station.
salzburg.com.306641.20: A return to the continent this year is not an issue.
salzburg.com.306641.21: In addition, Formula 1 will not be guest in America this year.
salzburg.com.306641.22: Cancellation meets with criticism in Brazil
salzburg.com.306641.23: Due to the tense Coronasituation, the race in Canada, the USA, Mexico and Brazil will not take place.
salzburg.com.306641.24: "We're looking forward to being back with them next season," said Carey.
salzburg.com.306641.25: The rejection of the America race was above all in Brazil: "The rejection came not surprising for us, but we cannot accept the reasons for this," said Tamas Rohonyi, promoter of the Grand Prix in São Paulo.
salzburg.com.306641.26: For example, the number of infections in the São Paulo area is significantly lower than in other regions of Brazil.
salzburg.com.306641.27: In addition, the concerns of some teams not wanting to drive in Brazil would not justify an excuse.
salzburg.com.306641.28: They were prepared for the required security measures.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.1: Greta Thunberg: Bad view against Donald Trump went around the world
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.2: Greta Thunberg spoke about her meeting with US President Donald Trump.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.3: Greta Thunberg was a guest in the well-known Latenight show of Stephen Colbert by video schalte and ripped in an interview with Donald Trump in her encounter with Donald Trump.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.4: Climate activist Greta Thunberg was a guest on a popular US Latenight show via video.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.5: She talked about her fight against the powerful of the world.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.6: The teenager also spoke about her famous "evil look" during her meeting with Donald Trump.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.7: New York City - In the past two years, climate activist Greta Thunberg made attentive with its tireless commitment to the "Fridays For Future."
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.8: Now she spoke in a well-known Latenight show about her plans for the future as well as her meeting with US President Donald Trump at the UN climate summit last year.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.9: Latenight moderator Stephen Colbert welcomed the 17-year-old Thunberg on your broadcast on Tuesday and led a long interview with the Schwedin.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.10: She spoke not only about her fight against climate change, but also about her conflict with the powerful of the world.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.11: "There are some things that surprised me," she said.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.12: "How far people go to shift the focus away from the climate crisis," she said.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.13: "Everything from organised hate campaigns to threats, just because a group of children goes on the street" has experienced them.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.14: Heads of state and leading politicians who scoff at her on social media or even try to silence her find her "funny," because the reactions show her "because they have no other answer to it."
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.15: It was particularly interesting at the end of the interview when Greta Thunberg was addressed to a well-known scene in which she threw US President Trump a bitter evil look behind.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.16: At the 2019 UN climate summit in New York, for which the nudist sailed across the Atlantic, her expressive gaze was caught by the cameras and has since been seen by countless people on the Internet.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.17: From the short clip a GIF was created, so an animated picture, which ultimately became one of the most frequently used images for Trump opponents.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.18: But what did the 17-year-old think about the US president at that moment?
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.19: On the relatively open question of Stephen Colbert, she only answered dry briefly: "To be honest, I believe that no further explanation needs."
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.20: The experienced satirist Colbert had probably not expected the quick-witted answer and disappeared from the picture with a short laugh.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.21: With her "How dare you?" -rede on the principles of climate protection, she remained remembered for many at the climate conference.

mittelbayerische.de.307290.1: Fleetwood Mac co-founder Peter Green died
mittelbayerische.de.307290.2: His life was like a roller coaster ride: After a rapid ascent with Fleetwood Mac, Fleetwood Mac went steep and then slowly upward again.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.3: Now the blues rock guitarist Peter Green has died at the age of 73.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.4: Ingenious guitarist, drugs junkie, cult pendant: The co-founder of the band Fleetwood Mac, Peter Green, is dead.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.5: He died peacefully in his sleep at the age of 73, family members announced in an official statement on Saturday, a further statement would be announced for the next few days.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.6: Top musicians such as Peter Frampton worshipped Green as one of the best blues and rock guitarist.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.7: Mick Fleetwood spoke in an emotional reaction of a "monumental loss" for all former and current members of the band Fleetwood Mac.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.8: The drummer Fleetwood and guitarist Green had founded the now legendary band in 1967 in London, until now its unforgotten instrumental hit "Albatross."
mittelbayerische.de.307290.9: The musician's life ("The End Of The Game," "In The Skies") resembled a rollercoaster ride.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.10: With Fleetwood Mac, Green experienced a fast climb - but the band celebrated its greatest successes without him.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.11: Among other things, there was a dispute because Green wanted to donate all of the group's profits to charity.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.12: He began to step up in wide garments and with large crucifix.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.13: Psychological problems are also said to have played a role.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.14: In 1970, Green left the band in 1970.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.16: The blues guitarist suffered drug abuse and schizophrenia, as biografen reported.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.17: For a long time, Green was treated in psychiatry.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.18: During a large part of the 1970s, the musician disappeared from the picture.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.19: He is said to have lived on the street for a time, worked as a cemetery gardener and spent some time in an Israeli kibbutz.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.20: Green was born in 1946 as a son of a Jewish family in the London district of Bethnal Green.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.21: From an early age he was enthusiastic about US blues musicians such as B.B. King and Muddy Waters.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.22: With eleven years, he studied the first guitarist.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.23: At the age of 15, the teenager began playing guitar professionally and five years later got the chance to appear on stage as lead guitarist for the instrumental band Peter B's Looners.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.24: Little later, he became a substitute for his idol Eric Clapton in the blood breakers.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.25: In the summer of 1967, in the midst of the blues boom, Green founded Fleetwood Mac with his Bluesbreakers colleagues Mick Fleetwood and John McVie.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.26: The song "Albatross," composed by Green, summed the group in the winter of 1968 / 69 the first number 1 hit and catapulted it to the top of the British music scene.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.27: But the rapid rise soon showed its downsides: Green could not cope with the media hype, his experiments with the drug LSD became more and more extreme.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.28: He commented on the life between music and searching later in an interview: "The worst thing happened to me in life is drugs - the best to land a number 1 hit."
mittelbayerische.de.307290.29: Towards the end of the decade, Green achieved a surprising success in 1979 with an album inspired by religious themes.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.30: Fleetwood Mac pigs this without him in new formation on a success wave.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.31: Their 1977 album "Rumours" sold more than 40 million copies worldwide.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.32: Despite various small solo successes, Green did not win a bigger comeback until he restarted with a group of friendly musicians in 1996.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.33: The British "Daily Telegraph" spoke at the time of a rock star returning to Earth.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.34: Green released several albums with the Peter Green Splinter Group, until the band released in 2004.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.35: For music experts, he was already a blues legend during his lifetime - and with his soft sound one of the most influential guitarists of the past decades.
